byline.original: By JESSE McKINLEY and MALIA WOLLAN

abstract: Wounding of Iraq war veteran Scott Olsen during a clash between Occupy Oakland protesters and Oakland police has provided a powerful rallying point for the Occupy movement and has generated an outpouring of sympathy.
snippet: The wounding of Scott Olsen, an Iraq war veteran, in a clash with the police in Oakland, Calif., has prompted calls for solidarity among Occupy encampments around the nation.
lead_paragraph: The wounding of Scott Olsen, an Iraq war veteran, in a clash with the police in Oakland, Calif., has prompted calls for solidarity among Occupy encampments around the nation.

headline.main: Outrage Over Veteran Injured at ‘Occupy’ Protest
headline.print_headline: Outrage Over Veteran Injured at ‘Occupy’ Protest
headline.seo: Outrage Grows Over Scott Olsen, Veteran Wounded at Occupy Oakland Protest
